entries.name: Battle! Sync Pair
entries.description: Played in battles against sync pairs like Swimmers, Street Thugs, etc.

entries.name: Battle! Powerful Sync Pair
entries.description: Played in battles against powerful sync pairs (bosses).

entries.name: Battle! Alder
entries.description: Played in battles against Alder, the former champion of Unova.

entries.name: Battle! Cyrus
entries.description: Played in battles against Cyrus, the boss of Team Galactic. He aims to form a new world without spirit or emotions.

entries.name: Battle! Archie
entries.description: Played in battles against Archie, the boss of Team Aqua. He aims to increase the water bodies of the planet with the help of Kyogre.

entries.name: Battle! Team Aqua and Team Magma
entries.description: Played in battles against grunts of Team Aqua/Team Magma

entries.name: Battle! Team Aqua and Team Magma Admin
entries.description: Played in battles against the admins of Team Aqua, namely Matt and Shelly, and Team Magma, namely Tabitha and Courtney.

entries.name: Battle! Bede
entries.description: Played in battles against Bede, a rival to the protagonists of Pokemon Sword amd Pokemon Shield, Victor and Gloria.

entries.name: Battle! Cheren and Bianca
entries.description: Played in battles against Cheren and Bianca, rivals of the protagonists of Pokemon Black and Pokemon White, Hilbert and Hilda.

entries.name: Battle! Alola Elite Four
entries.description: Played in battles against the Elite 4 of Alola, namely Olivia, Nanu, Acerola, Kahili and Molayne.

entries.name: Battle! Alola Elite Four: Acerola
entries.description: Played in battles against Acerola in the Alola Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.description: Played in battles against Hala in the Alola Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.description: Played in battles against Kahili in the Alola Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.description: Played in battles against Molayne in the Alola Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Kalos Elite Four
entries.description: Played in battles against the Elite 4 of Kalos, namely Siebold, Wikstrom, Drasna and Malva.

entries.name: Battle! Hoenn Elite Four
entries.description: Played in battles against the Elite 4 of Hoenn, namely Sidney, Glacia, Phoebe and Drake.

entries.name: Battle! Hoenn Elite Four: Phoebe
entries.description: Played in battles against Phoebe in the Hoenn Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.description: Played in battles against Drake in the Hoenn Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.description: Played in battles against Sydney in the Hoenn Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Hoenn Elite Four: Glacia
entries.description: Played in battles against Glacia in the Hoenn Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Unova Elite Four
entries.description: Played in battles against the Elite 4 of Unova, namely Marshal, Shauntal, Grimsley and Caitlin.

entries.description: Played in battles against Caitlin in the Unova Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Unova Elite Four: Grimsley
entries.description: Played in battles against Grimsley in the Unova Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.description: Played in battles against Shauntal in the Unova Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.description: Played in battles against Karen in the Johto Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.description: Played in battles against Koga in the Johto Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Johto Elite Four: Bruno
entries.description: Played in battles against Bruno int the Johto Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Kanto Elite Four: Lorelei
entries.description: Played in battles against Lorelei in the Kanto Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Kanto Elite Four: Agatha
entries.description: Played in battles against Agatha in the Kanto Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Kanto Elite Four: Bruno
entries.description: Played in battles against Bruno in the Kanto Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Kanto Elite Four: Lance
entries.description: Played in battles against Lance in the Kanto Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Sinnoh Elite Four
entries.description: Played in battles against the Elite 4 of Sinnoh, namely Flint, Aron, Bertha and idk who.

entries.name: Battle! Sinnoh Elite Four: Lucian
entries.description: Played in battles against Lucian in the Sinnoh Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Sinnoh Elite Four: Bertha
entries.description: Played in battles against Bertha in the Sinnoh Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Sinnoh Elite Four: Flint
entries.description: Played in battles against Flint in the Sinnoh Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Sinnoh Elite Four: Aaron
entries.description: Played in battles against Aaron in the Sinnoh Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Team Break
entries.description: Played in battles against normal trainers of Team Break.

entries.name: Battle! Team Break (Bosses)
entries.description: Played in battles against boss trainers of Team Break.

entries.name: Battle! Diantha
entries.description: Played in battles against Diantha, the champion of Kalos.

entries.name: Battle! Trainer (Holiday)
entries.description: Played in battles against trainers in the christmas holiday event.

entries.name: Battle! Champion Hau
entries.description: Played in battles against Hau in the Alola Challenge of the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Battle Chatelaine
entries.description: Played in battles against Battle Chatelaine Trainers.

entries.name: Battle! Steven
entries.description: Played in battles against Steven, the champion of Hoenn.

entries.name: Decisive Battle! Steven
entries.description: Played in certain battles against Steven, the champion of Hoenn.

entries.name: Battle! Leon
entries.description: Played in battles against Leon, the champion of Galar.

entries.name: Battle! Rachel and Sawyer
entries.description: Played in battles against Rachel and Sawyer, faithful retainers of Lear.

entries.name: Battle! Lear
entries.description: Played in battles against Lear, the heir of an unknown kingdom, founder of Pasio, and the host of the Pokemon Masters League, PML for short.

entries.name: Battle! Hoenn Frontier Brain
entries.description: Played in battles against the frontier brains of Hoenn Battle Frontier facility.

entries.name: Battle! Sinnoh Frontier Brain
entries.description: Played in battles against the frontier brains of Sinnoh Battle Frontier facility.

entries.name: Battle! Lysandre
entries.description: Played in battles against Lysandre, the boss of Team Flare. He aims to wipe out a significant amount of lives from the planet with the help of Yveltal.

entries.name: Battle! Ghetsis
entries.description: Played in battles against Ghetsis, the boss of Team Plasma and Team Neo Plasma. He aims to liberate Pokemon for the well-being of both Pokemon and Humans. He is also the adopted father of N.

entries.name: Battle! Team Galactic
entries.description: Played in battles against the grunts of Team Galactic.

entries.name: Battle! Team Galactic Commander
entries.description: Played in battles against the admins of Team Galactic, namely Mars, Jupiter and Saturn.

entries.name: Battle! Gladion
entries.description: Played in battles against Gladion, the brother of Lillie and son of Lusamine.

entries.name: Battle! Gladion (Short)
entries.description: A short version of "Battle! Gladion".

entries.name: Battle! Island Kahuna
entries.description: Played in battles against the Island Kahunas of Alola.

entries.name: Battle! Kalos Gym Leader
entries.description: Played in battles against the Gym Leaders of Kalos.

entries.name: Battle! Galar Gym Leader
entries.description: Played in battles against the Gym Leaders of Galar.

entries.name: Battle! Hoenn Gym Leader
entries.description: Played in battles against the Gym Leaders of Hoenn.

entries.name: Battle! Unova Gym Leader
entries.description: Played in battles against the Gym Leaders of Unova.

entries.name: Battle! Johto Gym Leader
entries.description: Played in battles against the Gym Leaders (and Elite Four) of Johto.

entries.name: Battle! Kanto Gym Leader
entries.description: Played in battles against the Gym Leaders (and Elite Four) of Kanto.

entries.name: Battle! Sinnoh Gym Leader
entries.description: Played in battles against the Gym Leaders of Sinnoh.

entries.name: Battle! Blue
entries.description: Played in battles against Blue, the former champion of Kanto and the rival of Red.

entries.name: Battle! Guzma
entries.description: Played in battles against Guzma, the boss of Team Skull.

entries.name: Battle! Trainer (Halloween)
entries.description: Played in battles against trainers in the halloween season event.

entries.name: Battle! Looker
entries.description: Played in battles against Looker, a detective of International Police from the Sinnoh.

entries.name: Battle! Hau
entries.description: Played in battles against Hau, a rival of the protagonists of Pokemon Sun and Pokemon Moon, Elio and Selene.

entries.name: Battle! Zinnia
entries.description: Played in battles against Zinnia, the heir of the Draconic tribe. She was bestowed upon a job with Rayquaza. Her battle theme uses violins, and I love it.

entries.name: Battle! Hop
entries.description: Played in battles against Hop, the younger brother of Leon & the rival of the protagonists of Pokemon Sword and Pokemon Shield, Victor and Gloria.

entries.name: Battle! Champion Iris
entries.description: Played in battles against Iris, the champion of Unova, the daughter of Drayden and a former Gym Leader of Unova.

entries.name: Battle! Barry
entries.description: Played in battles against Barry, the rival of the protagonists of Pokemon Diamond, Pokemon Pearl and Pokemon Platinum, Lucas and Dawn.

entries.name: Battle! Kukui
entries.description: Played in battles against Professor Kukui, a professor from Alola and the husband of Professor Burnet and he is definitely not The Masked Royal.

entries.name: Battle! Lake Guardian
entries.description: Played in battles against the lake guardian trio of Sinnoh. It consists of Mesprit, Uzie and Azelf.

entries.name: Battle! Cresselia
entries.description: Played in battles against Cresselia, a legendary Pokemon of Sinnoh.

entries.name: Battle! Entei
entries.description: Played in battles against Entei, a legendary Pokemon of Johto and a member of the Legendary Beat Trio.

entries.name: Battle! Ho-oh
entries.description: Played in battles against Ho-oh, a legendary Pokemon of Johto.

entries.name: Battle! Kanto Legendary Pokemon
entries.description: Played in battles against the legendary Pokemon of Kanto.

entries.name: Battle! Island Guardian
entries.description: Played in battles against the 4 Island Guardians of Alola, namely Tapu Koko, Tapu Fini, Tapu Bulu and Tapu Lele, also known as the "Tapus".

entries.name: Battle! Latias and Latios
entries.description: Played in battles against Latias and Latios, legendary Pokemon of Hoenn.

entries.name: Battle! Legendary Pokemon [Legendary Face-Off]
entries.description:
Played as a general battle theme in battles against Legendary Pokemon.
[Officially named "Legendary Face-Off"]

entries.name: Battle! Legendary Titans
entries.description: Played in battles against the Legendary Titans.

entries.name: Battle! Alola Legendary Pokemon
entries.description: Played in battles against Legendary Pokemon of Alola.

entries.name: Battle! Super-Ancient Pokemon
entries.description: Played in battles against Super Ancient Pokemon of Hoenn, namely Groudon, Kyogre and Rayquaza, also called the Weather Trio.

entries.name: Battle! Unova  Legendary Pokemon
entries.description: Played in battles against Legendary Pokemon of Unova.

entries.name: Battle! Lillie
entries.description: Played in battles against Lillie, the sister of Gladion and the daughter of Lusamine.

entries.name: Battle! Lillie (Short)
entries.description: A short version of "Battle! Lillie".

entries.name: Battle! Lisia
entries.description: Played in battles against Lisia, niece of Wallace, a contest idol and a performer.

entries.name: Battle! Lusamine
entries.description: Played in battles against Lusamine, boss of the Aether Paradise and the mother of young ambitious trainers, Gladion and Lillie.

entries.name: Battle! Lusamine (Short)
entries.description: A short version of "Battle! Lusamine".

entries.name: Battle! Marnie
entries.description: Played in battles against Marnie, the sister of the 7th Gym Leader of Galar, Piers. Her brother formed Team Yell to cheer and support her in battles.

entries.name: Battle! Maxie
entries.description: Played in battles against Maxie, the leader of Team Magma.  He aims to increase the landmass of the Earth for greater heights of achievements and progress of Humankind .

entries.name: Battle! Maxie (Short)
entries.description: A short version of "Battle! Maxie".

entries.name: Battle! Wallace
entries.description: Played in battles against Wallace, the 8th Gym Leader of Hoenn, uncle of Lisia, and in some timelines, the champion of Hoenn.

entries.name: Battle! Wally
entries.description: Played in battles against Wally, the rival of the protagonists of the 3rd Generation Pokemon Games as well as their remakes, Brendan and May.

entries.name: Battle! N
entries.description: Played in battles against N, the son of Ghetsis and king of Team Plasma. His full name is Natural Harmonia Gropius.

entries.name: Battle! Trainer (New Year)
entries.description: Played in battles against trainers in the New Year event.

entries.name: Battle! Piers
entries.description: Played in battles against Piers, the 8th Gym Leader of Galar, the brother of Marnie and the founder of Team Yell.

entries.name: Battle! Sycamore
entries.description: Played in battles against Professor Sycamore, a professor from Kalos.

entries.name: Battle! Region's Best
entries.description: Played in battles against the region's best (game/anime protagonists).

entries.name: Battle! Plumeria
entries.description: Played in battles against Plumeria, the admin of Team Skull. She likes pink and cute stuff.

entries.name: Battle! Special Costume Trainer
entries.description: Played in battles against sync pairs with special costumes.

entries.name: Battle! Trainer (Prestige)
entries.description: Played in battles against trainers in the prestige event.

entries.name: Battle! Red
entries.description: Played in battles against Red.

entries.name: Battle! Red, Blue and Leaf
entries.description: Played in the special battle against Red, Blue and Leaf at the end of Victory Road, a sort of tutorial on efficient usage of sync pairs in the Champion Stadium.

entries.name: Battle! Paulo
entries.description: Played in battles against Paulo, the rival of the main character of Pokemon Masters EX.

entries.name: Battle! Team Rocket
entries.description: Played in battles against grunts of Team Rocket.

entries.name: Battle! Team Rocket Executive
entries.description: Played in battles against executives of Team Rocket, namely Proton, Petrel, Ariana, and Archer.

entries.name: Battle! The Masked Royal
entries.description: Played in battles against the Masked Royal of Alola. He is definitely not Professor Kukui and that's the only thing I know about him sorry.

entries.name: Battle! Giovanni
entries.description: Played in battles against Giovanni, the boss of Team Rocket. He aims to use Pokemon as tools to earn money and dominate over the world.

entries.name: Decisive Battle! Giovanni
entries.description: Played in certain battles against Giovanni, the boss of Team Rocket. He aims to use Pokemon as tools to earn money and dominate over the world.

entries.name: Battle! Ash
entries.description: Played in battles against Ash, the main and permanent protagonist of the Pokemon Anime. This theme is inspired by the anime opening "One, Two, Three" used in the seasons 23, 24 and 25.

entries.name: Battle! Trial Captain
entries.description: Played in battles Trial Captains of Alola

entries.name: Battle! Cynthia
entries.description: Played in battles against Cynthia, the Champion of Sinnoh.

entries.name: Decisive Battle! Cynthia
entries.description: Played in certain battles against Cynthia, the Champion of Sinnoh.

entries.name: Battle! Silver
entries.description: Played in battles against Silver, the rival of the protagonists of the Generation 2 Pokemon games, namely Ethan, Lyra and Kris.

entries.name: Battle! Sonia
entries.description: Played in battles against Sonia.

entries.name: Battle! Subway Master
entries.description: Played in battles against Subway Masters of Unova Subway Battle facility, namely Ingo and Emmet.

entries.name: Battle! Trainer (Summer) [Sync Pair Showtime]
entries.description:
Played in battles against trainers in the Summer events.
[Officially named "Sync Pair Showtime"]

entries.name: Battle! Kalos Trainer
entries.description: Played in battles against trainers from Kalos.

entries.name: Battle! Galar Trainer
entries.description: Played in battles against trainers from Galar.

entries.name: Battle! Unova Trainer
entries.description: Played in battles against trainers from Unova.

entries.name: Battle! Johto Trainer
entries.description: Played in battles against trainers from Johto.

entries.name: Battle! Trainer (Sinnoh)
entries.description: Played in battles against trainers from Sinnoh.

entries.name: Battle! Lance
entries.description: Played in battles against Lance, the Champion of Kanto, a former member of its Elite 4, and a cousin of Clair.

entries.name: Battle! Cynthia, Lance and Steven
entries.description: Played in the special battle against the three champions, Cynthia, Lance and Steven.

entries.name: Battle! Wild Pokemon: Alola
entries.description: Played in the battles of Pokemon Masters Day (celebrated 25th of each month). It is a remix of the Alola Wild Battle Theme.

entries.name: Battle! Wild Pokemon: Kalos
entries.description: Played in the battles of Pokemon Masters Day (celebrated 25th of each month). It is a remix of the Kalos Wild Battle Theme.

entries.name: Battle! Wild Pokemon: Galar
entries.description: Played in the battles of Pokemon Masters Day (celebrated 25th of each month). It is a remix of the Galar Wild Battle Theme.

entries.name: Battle! Wild Pokemon: Hoenn
entries.description: Played in the battles of Pokemon Masters Day (celebrated 25th of each month). It is a remix of the Hoenn Wild Battle Theme.

entries.name: Battle! Wild Pokemon: Unova
entries.description: Played in the battles of Pokemon Masters Day (celebrated 25th of each month). It is a remix of the Unova Wild Battle Theme.

entries.name: Battle! Wild Pokemon: Johto
entries.description: Played in the battles of Pokemon Masters Day (celebrated 25th of each month). It is a remix of the Johto Wild Battle Theme.

entries.name: Battle! Wild Pokemon: Kanto
entries.description: Played in the battles of Pokemon Masters Day (celebrated 25th of each month). It is a remix of the Kanto Wild Battle Theme.

entries.name: Battle! Wild Pokemon: Sinnoh
entries.description: Played in the battles of Pokemon Masters Day (celebrated 25th of each month). It is a remix of the Sinnoh Wild Battle Theme.

entries.name: Battle! Brendan and May
entries.description: Played in battles against Brendan and May, the protagonists of Pokemon Black and Pokemon White.
